transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Narendra ji kaise hain?
Customer: Badhiya hun ji. Kaun bol rahe ho?
Executive: Narendra ji Abbas baat kar rahe the IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji boliye sir.
Executive: Actually aapka us din call aaye the.
Customer: Haan haan call aaya tha.
Executive: Haan actually Saturday tha na us din. Saturday hamara off rehta hai. Main utha paya nahi tha aapka call.
Customer: Nahi nahi mere paas aage se call aaya tha.
Executive: Haan maine hi call kara tha.
Customer: Haan tab maine wapas se maine kaha main bahar tha koi kaam se us din Saturday night thi to waise hi aapko pata hi hai.
Executive: Haan haan wahi wahi wali baat samajh raha hun. Haan baki kaisa chal raha hai abhi IndiaMART ka sir?
Customer: IndiaMART ka sir main leads kam hi use kar raha hun sir usme sir aadhe aise hi matlab call karta hai fir unka response tak nahi aata to main kar hi kam raha hun.
Executive: Hmm. Sahi hai. Beech mein to aap karne lag gaye the.
Customer: Achche se consume karne lag gaye the. Kar raha tha main kar raha tha beech mein consume. Abhi ab ek party ka aaya mere paas maine baat ki thi wo Delhi ki party thi aage se contact kiya tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To ab wo bata rahe wo payment wala option wahi hai ki payment advance nahi denge to hum aise kaise bhej de. Hamara advance chalta hai pura advance pe hai. Maal mein dikat aa rahi hai.
Executive: Advance. Kya naam hai company ka?
Customer: Kya pata kya company ka naam hai pata nahi kuch Delhi mein hai koi matlab hai 500 meter ka order tha. Hum bhi response de rahe the.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To ab wo bata rahe ke 50% kar denge. 50% bhi tab karenge jab matlab maal yahan se nikal jayega aur hum bilti bhejenge tab. To wo to maal nikal gaya yahan se aur bilti hum bhale hi bilti rakho kuch hi rakho. Wo to maal yahan se nikal gaya uske baad aap kahan se payment kar doge 50% bhi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Matlab ab jaise ki Flipkart hai. Flipkart. Koi banda nahi hai aapka Delhi mein? Delhi mein koi log nahi hai aapke?
Customer: Delhi mein sir hamara aise kaam Delhi ka chalta hai but un party se mil chuke hai na. Ab ye party to sir kuch bhi apna matlab aise bata bhi nahi rahi. Humne kaha chalo theek hai usne mere se rate puchi rate maine bata di. To kya hai is rate ka jo bhi maal hai na matlab jaise ki ab aap kapde lene jate ho sir. Ek example deta hun aap kapde lene jate ho aapne kaha ki jo hai na 600 ki jeans aa rahi na wo mere ko sari pack kar do. Sari pack kar do alag alag color mein matlab mix karke. To mix karke kaun use karta hai aap ek color leke aaoge na aapko blue pasand hai to blue leke aaoge. Wo party waise keh rahi hai mix karke pack kar do to mix wala kya hai system hai ka kapda. Koi design to pasand aani chahiye na ke mix karke pack kar do 60 wala sara. To ye to.
Executive: Mix wala kuch hota hi nahi hai.
Customer: Haan wahi to ye baat se aisa lag raha hai mere ko tab maine main nahi kar raha baat maine kaha chhodo. Maine kaha kahin maine mix karke bhi pack karke bhi bhijwa diya bilti bhi maine bhej di aur fir 50% bhi nahi aaya aur maal bhi pahunch gaya sari samasya hi to hai fir.
Executive: Haan thoda wo hai cheezein.
Customer: Haan abhi iska matlab ye nahi ki aap matlab consume to kariye na kam se kam. Aage wali matlab koi na koi to client achche aur milenge na sir aapko.
Executive: Milenge sir dekhte hain ab dheere dheere kar rahe hain consume to. Aaj karunga ek do to.
Executive: Haan isse open karke aap isse consume kariye aage. Hmm baki product ka product to sab sahi hai ek price ek product ka price galat aa raha hai fabric bleaching service ka.
Customer: Achcha kya hona chahiye fabric bleaching service ka? 50 55 kar do na aap 50 55 kar do.
Executive: Kya hota hai ye unit mein kya rahega?
Customer: 50 rupees meter ye rehta hai meter rehta hai kaise rehta hai inka. Matlab kaise kapda unka bhi matlab usi hisab se rehta hai ki RF ka kapda aata hai ek ek bleach wala aata hai to inki rate ye rehti hai 50 55.
Executive: 50 55 rehti hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek second rukiye main ise karke dekhta hun fabric bleaching service.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Main ise kar raha hun.
Customer: Aur log to price nahi dale hue hain.
Executive: Haan nahi nahi theek hai sir wo to koi nahi.
Customer: Hmm. Ye baki sir apna na jab aapne call kara tha main call utha nahi paya tha to ek incoming ticket open ho gaya tha.
Executive: Haan haan koi nahi sir wo to koi nahi main bhi samajh gaya tha maine kaha fir.
Customer: Haan. To kya main ye ticket ko band kar dun sir? Ticket open ho gaya tha incoming call ka.
Executive: Haan ye mere number pe kar do na bhale hi open koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai main ise close kara de raha hun theek hai na? Haan haan baki kya kehte hain. Haan sari cheezein sahi hai sir theek hai na bas aap use kariye service ko baki koi issue ho to bataiyega theek hai na? Mail pe ek feedback jayega mere liye de dena theek hai sir? Haan theek hai. Okay sir okay okay. Okay. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are not responsive on IndiaMART.

- Facing issues with payment advances.

- Price of fabric bleaching service is incorrect.

- An incoming ticket was opened.



Resolution:

- Executive listened to the customer's concerns.

- Executive agreed to close the ticket.

- Executive will correct the price of the service.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide feedback on mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, payment, price, ticket, feedback
